author: LCordair
title: Archer, quite possiby your best friend in Mid-town Manhattan.
text:
Whether you are travelling for business or pleasure, the Archer Hotel in NYC offers its guests very-nicely appointed rooms, a great restaurant, 2 bars (one is rooftop), special guest amenities, luxurious linens and towels, and some of the best staff I have had the pleasure of experiencing in a long while. All of this plus a great location! I will definitely stay again.
Room Tip: A room with a view of the Empire State building is well worth it! See more room tips
